oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Bluegrass Caravan with Lester Flatt at Capitol Theatre (19492)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Flatt, Lester; Lewis Family (Bluegrass musical group); Metal photoplates; Martha White Foods;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color half sheet (black and red on green) announcing the Bluegrass Caravan featuring Lester Flatt and The Nashville Grass and The Lewis Family playing stoney creek grass at the Grand Ole Opry Capitol Theatre on February 3. Poster features metal photoplates of Lester Flatt and The Nashville Grass, The Lewis Family, and Martha White Flour and Corn Meal. To view the paperwork associated with this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/20992.
